title: A retro health fad meets modern conservation (The Trust for Public Land)
text: ( Source : The Trust for Public Land ) Before anyone hyped kombucha or acai berry smoothies, a simpler drink was all the rage among health nuts: mineral water, drawn from natural springs. In the late 1800s and early 1900s , American companies
